meta.title: FUDFATE - Crypto Tarot
meta.description: Discover your crypto fortune with FUDFATE, the crypto tarot reading app.

about.title: About FUDFATE
about.description: FUDFATE is a crypto tarot app that uses the power of the blockchain to predict your crypto future.

cards.title: CRYPTO TAROT CARDS
cards.description: Our custom deck of crypto-themed tarot cards will reveal insights about your crypto journey.

errors.deckLoadFailedDescription: We couldn't load your decks, so we've selected the default deck for you. Please try again later.

tarot.focusOnQuestion: Focus on a question about your crypto future. Be specific and clear.
tarot.questionPlaceholder: What do the cards say about my next crypto investment?
tarot.intentionDescription: Focus on your question or intention while the cards are being shuffled.
tarot.enterIntention: Please enter your intention or question
tarot.question: Question
tarot.deck1Description: The original crypto-themed deck with 22 unique cards representing key blockchain concepts.
tarot.deck2Description: A mystical journey through the metaverse with unique NFT-inspired artwork.
tarot.noReadings: You haven't done any readings yet. Try your first reading now!
tarot.noReadingsAvailable: You haven't done any readings yet. Start your first reading in the Reading tab!
tarot.mockQuestion2: When should I sell my Bitcoin?
tarot.mockResult1: Your investments show promise, but patience will be key.
tarot.mockResult2: The cards suggest waiting for the market to stabilize before making decisions.
